name: comment-graph
description: CLI wrapper for comment-graph using bundled WebAssembly

scripts.build: ROOT="$(cd .. && pwd)" && mkdir -p $ROOT/npm/wasm && GOCACHE=$ROOT/.gocache GOMODCACHE=$ROOT/.gomodcache GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -C $ROOT -o npm/wasm/comment-graph.wasm ./cmd/comment-graph && cp $(go env GOROOT)/lib/wasm/wasm_exec.js $ROOT/npm/wasm/
